tooltips.culture_info: Company culture refers to the work environment and overall philosophy in that company. Please select up to two cultural attributes that describe your company. This allows us to better connect you with candidates who will thrive in your unique environment, ensuring a stronger team fit and long-term success.

messages.user_accepted_desc: You have granted {{email}} access to the platform.
messages.user_role_updated_desc: You have changed {{email}} role to Admin employer.
messages.user_deleted_desc: You have removed {{email}} from the platform. This action cannot be undone.
messages.user_deleted_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{email}}?
messages.user_deleted_warning: Once deleted, this user will no longer be able to access your company.
messages.error_default: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later
